page.title: 01Oakington, Weitinch, Hilton
page.content: Villages of Oakington, Weitinch, and ____________________________________ parts of Hilton and Longstanton _______________________________ Cambridgeshire. ______________ The block area is fairly typical for this part of Cambridgeshire with no significant hills. A former Royal Air Force station (now used by the Army) occupies a large amount of land, the remainder being almost entirely used for agricultural purposes. In the villages many new houses have been built since the 1939-45 war, only a small proportion of the working population are employed in the village, the majority working in Cambridge and some commuting daily to London.
